ygData.subject: Enter the trickster

Subject: Enter the trickster
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=225937926; y=136zItHG0bX6j3qgvt5ygkc2L7s-6VAiKcdE8BmdcaKwZIE0WRHW

The creature was dead. Nothing that had any intelligence could deny
it. In fact, in had been killed days before, and after its predator
had feasted on most of it, the bugs had come. Now though, they were
gone, fleeing the unnatural that had come from inside the earth.

And now, the creature was about to become a meal for the third time in
its death. A lean coyote, devoid of any fat, with barely skin on its
bones, looked at the corpse with delight. Finally something good to eat!

It came up to the dead animal and started tearing at putrid pieces of
meat, pulling bones and decomposing tendons.

The coyote was happy. It could have hunted, but it prefered much more
the sweet odor of rotting flesh. He learned more from it.

The coyote transformed, becoming a no less hungry-looking robot. It
turned southwards and engaged his comm unit, hoping it would reach.

Deadfur: Unit Deadfur to Watcher Central, come in please.
